description:
Capital Contractors Ltd, located on Navan Road, Navan/Ottawa, and specialized in flat roofing and waterproofing systems, is currently looking for a full time experienced estimator with knowledge of the following roof assemblies: 2 Ply Modified Bitumen, Built Up, TPO, EPDM, PVC and Garland.
Estimation Responsibilities

 Prepares work to be estimated by gathering proposals, blueprints, specifications and related documents.
 Identifies labour, material and time requirements by studying the relative documents.
 Frequent visits to site or as required for project quoting purposes.
 Computes costs by analyzing labour, material and time requirements.
 Presents prepared estimate by assembling and displaying numerical and descriptive information to management.
 Shares the maintenance of the cost at a base.
 Contributes to the team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
 Tender and bidding document take-offs.
 Other duties as required.

Project Manager Responsibilities

 Lead the planning and implementation of project.
 Facilitate the definition of project scope, goals and deliverables.
 Define and allocate project tasks and resource requirements.
 Develop full scale project execution plans.
 Manage pre-determined project budget and project resources.
 Schedule project timelines to align with customer and constructor requirements.
 Track project deliverables.
 Provide direction and support to on-site crews.
 Quality assurance & quality control.
 Monitor and report on progress of the project to all stakeholders, including project changes.
 Present reports defining project progress, problems and solutions.

The ideal candidate MUST have:

 Previous flat roofing experience and/or cost estimating, sales experience.
 Excellent written & verbal communication skills
 Able to pay close attention to details
 Able to multi task & handle multiple assignments/projects at once
 Able to read, interpret and understand blueprints
 Good practical and people skills
 A valid driver’s licence and clean drivers record
 Able to work well with others in a team environment as well as independently

Job Type: Full-time
Salary: $55,000.00-$70,000.00 per year
Benefits:

 Dental care
 Extended health care
 Life insurance
 Vision care

Schedule:

 Monday to Friday

Experience:

 construction estimating: 1 year (preferred)
